commands.commands: {{recipient}}, these are all commands on this channel: {{commands}}

counters.addDuplicate: %s, Counter does already exist. Use !counter %s + to add.
counters.showCount: {{recipient}}, The counter {{counter}} has a value of {{count}}
counters.updated: {{recipient}}, The counter {{counter}} has been updated and now has a value of {{count}}

commands.credit: {{recipient}}, our overlay is based on the icon-pack BeautyLine: https://www.gnome-look.org/p/1425426/
commands.donation: {{recipient}}, you can currently not donate to us, but thank you for the thought <3
commands.github: {{recipient}}, all of our projects are located here: https://coderoria.com

language.noLangGiven: {{recipient}}, please provide a language to switch to.

shoutout.message: Hey! Consider following {{name}}! Their last stream was {{game}}: www.twitch.tv/{{name}}
shoutout.noGame: Hey! Consider following {{name}}! That channel is amazing

permit.message: {{recipient}}, you can post links for the next 60s.

setTitle.success: {{recipient}}, the title has been changed to "{{title}}"
setTitle.noTitle: {{recipient}}, please provide a title to set.

setGame.success: {{recipient}}, the game has been set to "{{gameName}}"

commands.failed: {{recipient}} sorry, the command failed to execute.

clip.notCreated: There was an error creating the clip.

filters.warning: This is a warning. %s, please stop %s!
